name: AESCULAP OrthoPilot Elite VR Palpation
description:
Experience how innovative medical tools made by B. Braun support surgeons during this gamified knee replacement surgery minigame. Under the instructions of the AESCULAP® OrthoPilot®Elite, you will use the Multitool to palpate your patient's leg, ensuring precision during surgery.

Assume the role of a surgeon, beat the best and make your way to the top of the leaderboards!
